content: is worked in blo see figure 2 4 single_crochet in each of the 4 front center sts 4sts ch1 and turn 2 now working in both loops- single_crochet 4 4sts ch1 and turn 3 2sc single_crochet 2 2sc 6sts ch1 and turn 4 single_crochet 6 6sts ch1 and turn 5 2sc single_crochet 4 2sc 8sts ch1 and turn 6 single_crochet 8 8sts f/o blades using gray yarn and working in row 1 chain 15 starting with the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in each chain 14sts chain 1 and turn 2 single_crochet in each st and f/o 3 using white attach yarn at the start of the chain 15 and single_crochet in each st across 14sts 4 ch1 and turn single_crochet 3 3sts 5 ch1 and turn single_crochet 3 3sts f/o leaving a tail for sewing 6 using white and leaving a tail this will be a separate piece you will sew on chain 4 and starting with the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet 3 3sts 7 ch1 and turn single_crochet 3 3sts f/o leaving a tail for sewing sew the small white piece to the last three stitches on the opposite end attach the small white pieces to the base of the sole making sure it is centered using a long piece of white yarn and your needle weave the laces in and out of the edges of the sides
